headline.print_headline: Killing of 7 Marks Rise of Mexico Drug Corridor
headline.main: Killing of 7 Marks Rise of Mexico Drug Corridor

lead_paragraph: The massacre of seven men near the Mexico-Arizona border came in a previously quiet area increasingly used as a drug-trafficking corridor, and a U.S. expert said Friday the attack in the newly valuable territory could be the work of rivals of the once-dominant Sinaloa cartel trying to exploit the arrest of the gang's leader.
